title: FNS 27-Jikan TV: Nihon no Rekishi Anime

alternative_titles.ja: FNS27時間テレビ にほんのれきし アニメ

synopsis: Special animated corners part of FNS 27-Jikan TV: Nihon no Rekishi that aired on Fuji TV. The corners feature characters from Chibi Maruko-chan, Dragon Ball Super, Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo, and One Piece as they explore the history of Japan's from the Paleolithic to Heisei period.
